name: DynaPass
overview:
DynaPass Inc. is the leading provider of out-of-band two-factor authentication solutions to companies worldwide, with locations in the United States and Sweden. Founded in 2011 and led by industry experts, DynaPass provides the best in class security solutions to key verticals such as Healthcare, Education, Financial Services, and Subscription Based Services.

The flagship patented security solution, DynaPass (U.S. Patent #6,993,658), offers strong authentication for enterprise and consumer applications. The DynaPass Security Platform allows users to simply receive a one-time password (OTP) via SMS text message to authenticate when accessing network assets. By leveraging a device every user already has, a mobile phone, the patented DynaPass Security Solution enables rapid deployment of a zero-footprint technology and cost-effective two-factor authentication.

DynaPass, Inc. is driven by the belief that security and simplicity are intrinsically tied. The mobile phone is the ideal tool to accomplish both. It provides the strong, out-of-band security that is critical to protecting against today’s threats as well as the simplicity afforded by the use of a ubiquitous device.

DynaPass was awarded the Red Herring Top 100 Global Technologies in 2010, and in 2007, was the awarded the “Oscars of Wireless”, WBI Award for Wireless Broadband Innovation.
